<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="comment">/// DemoteRegToStack - This function takes a virtual register computed by an</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Instruction and replaces it with a slot in the stack frame, allocated via</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="comment">/// alloca.  This allows the CFG to be changed around without fear of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="comment">/// invalidating the SSA information for the value.  It returns the pointer to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the alloca inserted to create a stack slot for I.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5870f3f7c4e3617de1753e793aee726a"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/allocainst">AllocaInst</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5870f3f7c4e3617de1753e793aee726a">llvm::DemoteRegToStack</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VolatileLoads,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="normal">                                   std::optional&lt;BasicBlock::iterator&gt; AllocaPoint) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We cannot demote invoke instructions to the stack if their normal edge</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is critical. Therefore, split the critical edge and create a basic block</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Change all of the users of the instruction to read from the stack slot.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.use&#95;empty()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;U = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.user&#95;back());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42;PN = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;PHINode&gt;</a>(U)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If this is a PHI node, we can&#39;t insert a load of the value before the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// use.  Instead insert the load in the predecessor block corresponding</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to the incoming value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note that if there are multiple edges from a basic block to this PHI</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// node that we cannot have multiple loads. The problem is that the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// resulting PHI node will have multiple values (from each load) coming in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// from the same block, which is illegal SSA form. For this reason, we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// keep track of and reuse loads we insert.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;BasicBlock&#42;, Value&#42;&gt;</a> Loads;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0, e = PN-&gt;getNumIncomingValues(); i != e; ++i)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PN-&gt;getIncomingValue(i) == &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;&amp;V = Loads&#91;PN-&gt;getIncomingBlock(i)&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!V) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Insert the load into the predecessor block</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">            V = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">new</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loadinst">LoadInst</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getType(), Slot, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getName() + </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;.reload&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">                             VolatileLoads,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">                             PN-&gt;getIncomingBlock(i)-&gt;getTerminator()-&gt;getIterator());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">            Loads&#91;PN-&gt;getIncomingBlock(i)&#93; = V;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal">          PN-&gt;setIncomingValue(i, V);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If this is a normal instruction, just insert a load.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">new</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loadinst">LoadInst</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getType(), Slot, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getName() + </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;.reload&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">                              VolatileLoads, U-&gt;getIterator());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">      U-&gt;replaceUsesOfWith(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, V);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Insert stores of the computed value into the stack slot. We have to be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// careful if I is an invoke instruction, because we can&#39;t insert the store</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// AFTER the terminator instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a98c0a84a5dfa8bce341c829709f171e5">BasicBlock::iterator</a> InsertPt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.isTerminator()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">    InsertPt = ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getIterator();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Don&#39;t insert before PHI nodes or landingpad instrs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;PHINode&gt;</a>(InsertPt) || InsertPt-&gt;isEHPad(); ++InsertPt)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;CatchSwitchInst&gt;</a>(InsertPt))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;CatchSwitchInst&gt;</a>(InsertPt)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Handler : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a26e2a938b431eaa6eca2beaa96410c9d">successors</a>(&amp;&#42;InsertPt))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">new</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/storeinst">StoreInst</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, Slot, Handler-&gt;getFirstInsertionPt());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Slot;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="comment">/// DemotePHIToStack - This function takes a virtual register computed by a PHI</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="comment">/// node and replaces it with a slot in the stack frame allocated via alloca.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The PHI node is deleted. It returns the pointer to the alloca inserted.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6467fad9a534208a2ae56241d19cbba7"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/allocainst">AllocaInst</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6467fad9a534208a2ae56241d19cbba7">llvm::DemotePHIToStack</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>, std::optional&lt;BasicBlock::iterator&gt; AllocaPoint) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0, e = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>-&gt;getNumIncomingValues(); i &lt; e; ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">new</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loadinst">LoadInst</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>-&gt;getType(), Slot, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>-&gt;getName() + </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;.reload&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a>-&gt;getIterator());</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">new</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loadinst">LoadInst</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>-&gt;getType(), Slot, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>-&gt;getName() + </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;.reload&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, InsertPt);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>-&gt;replaceAllUsesWith(V);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Delete PHI.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
